short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and organize your internet saves with Noterr

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Noterr makes it easy to save anything from the internet, easily with a shortcut. Organize it automatically and gives you ability to organize, share and extract it further.

You can save almost every type of content on the internet, we are constantly adding support for new types. Right now you can save
- Images
- YT Videos (with timestamp)
- Tweets
- Web Pages
- Links
- Text Snippets (direct text links)
- Custom Notes with Webpages
- LLM Chats

Join me in building Noterr and help me to build Noterr a go-to tool for organizing internet clutter.
